physicalDescription.extent: Material:Pen and ink with wash on paper; mounted on boardDimensions:315 x 433 mm, on board 345 x 462 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Relief shown by shading.Plan of the Aden peninsula features the military site with defence structures including Victoria Bastion, Arsenal, Magazine, Barracks, and Tunnel. Coastal defences shown include Pier of Obstruction, Tower battery, West Gate battery, Ras Morbat Fort, Steamer Point and Coal Depot.Inscriptions:On recto, bottom right-hand corner:‘J. Holland Captain Assist’ Quarter Master General of the Army’.Below neat line:‘[illegible] Poona February 12th 1863’.
